entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
